original_text: Thou wilt perform the truth to Jacob, and the mercy to Abraham, which thou hast sworn unto our fathers from the days of old.
korean_text: 주께서 옛적에 우리 조상들에게 맹세하신 대로 야곱에게 성실을 베푸시며 아브라함에게 인애를 더하시리이다

sentences.original_text: Thou wilt perform truth to Jacob
which thou hast sworn unto our fathers
